title: Added Simple Share feature
description: You can now copy the link to the site using the hyperlinktext 'share' on the bottom of the page.

title: Added Custom Hex Color Support
description:
You can now input your own custom hex color codes and apply them to your message.
And added some more preset color buttons.

title: Color Buttons Added
description: Added preset color buttons for quick text coloring in messages.

title: Actual 'In-Game' Preview
description: The preview now actually shows how the message would look in-game, but in italic for now.

title: First Steps
description: You can now type text, and it will come out colored in the preview just like in clash of clans.
